DOC.brief_summary: Observational study to investigate nutrition state in all admitted patients in ICU. Measurement by BIVA and SNAQ score.
DOC.detailed_description: Malnutrition is a great problem in healthcare, its related to mortality, infections and length of stay. Observational study to investigate nutrition state in all admitted patients in ICU. Measurement by BIVA and SNAQ score. All patients were asked for their nutrition state by SNAQ and the BIVA measurement is done by a trained doctor.
